unnormalised: Regarding the recent hike in auto-rickshaw fares, commuters travelling from Andheri E to BKC now have to pay approx. Rs. 200. normalised: Regarding the recent hike in auto-rickshaw fares, commuters travelling from Andheri E to B-K-C now have to pay approximately rupees two hundred. The Maharashtra State Road Transport Corporation (M-S-R-T-C) has proposed adding five hundred new buses on the Mumbai-Pune route, with fares starting at rupee five hundred. Several travellers also reported traffic congestion on the Mumbai-Nashik highway near Igatpuri over the weekend, delaying trips by two to three hours. Considering these factors, perhaps the railway authorities could consider preponing the Virar-Dahanu local train services, as that would help many commuters, especially during peak hours like eight A-M to ten A-M and six P-M to eight P-M.
